properties.name: spring.ldap.default-password
properties.description: Default SHA/SSHA hashed password to be used when creating users in LDAP.

properties.name: delius.secret
properties.description: Shared secret key between National Delius and UMT, to support delegated authentication via request parameters.

properties.name: delius.ldap.base.users
properties.description: Base entry for Users in the LDAP.

properties.name: delius.ldap.base.groups
properties.description: Base entry for Groups in the LDAP.

properties.name: delius.ldap.base.clients
properties.description: Base entry for OAuth Clients in the LDAP.

properties.name: delius.ldap.base.roles
properties.description: Base entry for the Role Catalogue in the LDAP.

properties.name: delius.ldap.base.role-groups
properties.description: Base entry for the RoleGroup Catalogue in the LDAP.

properties.name: cache.evict.delay
properties.description: How often the Database and LDAP caches should be cleared, in milliseconds. Defaults to 24 hours.

properties.name: spring.ldap.useOracleAttributes
properties.description: Whether to use the 'orclActiveStartDate' and 'orclActiveEndDate' attributes instead of the 'startDate' and 'endDate' attributes in the User LDAP entry.

properties.name: spring.data.redis.embedded
properties.description: Whether to enable the in-memory Redis server on port ${spring.redis.port} for the OAuth token store.

properties.name: redis.configure.no-op
properties.description: Creates a NO-OP bean for Redis configuration. This prevents Spring from automatically attempting to update the configuration on the Redis cluster.
